pageTitle: Check your answers before sending the SR1 form

declaration.heading: Declaration
declaration.p1: By sending this SR1 form, you confirm that:
declaration.confirmation1: the person named in this report is your patient
declaration.confirmation2: this is a full report of their condition and treatment
declaration.confirmation3: you have read the guidance, and you are satisfied that the SR1 form is appropriate
